author: sussman
msg: Locking branch:  bugfix: make ra_dav__get_lock() return lock->creation_date.
* subversion/mod_dav_svn/lock.c
(dav_svn_get_locks, dav_svn_find_lock):  send the custom
creationdate header in the request response, so svn clients can see it.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_dav/session.c
(pre_send_hook):   notice the server's custom creationdate response
header for both LOCK and PROPFIND.
(svn_ra_dav__get_lock):  grab the creationdate header value if available.

author: lundblad
msg: * trunk/notes/locking/TODO.txt: Tweak. Some items done.

author: josander
msg: Fix: The revision number now shows up in the chm files opening page
Previously, the revision number entity was not set in src\en\book\version.xml
when building the MS HTML-Help doc. Now, that's fixed.
* packages/win32-innosetup/tools/mk_svndoc.pl:
(Main): Changed accordingly

author: sussman
msg: Locking branch:  followup fixes (from lundblad) for 'svn info'.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_svn/client.c
(ra_svn_stat):  call factorized handle_unsupported_cmd().
* subversion/libsvn_client/info.c
(svn_client_info):  look for NOT_IMPLEMENTED errors in three places.

author: sussman
msg: Locking branch:  weekly merge of (trunk, r13249:13286) to branch.
